name: Logicrays WP Mailchimp Signup form with popup
author: LogicRays WordPress Team

sections.description:
A full-featured WordPress Mailchimp Subscriber form with modal popup which fulfils all subscribers, emails and get more subscribres easily.

Features

Easy to setup
Responsive
Easy to customized
Built in shortcode
Mailchimp Signup newsletter.
Modal popup integrated.
Don’t show me again set
For more features Please contact us at Logicrays
sections.installation:
1. Upload Zip file lr-mailchimp-subscription to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php echo do_shortcode('[LRM_WP_MAILCHIMP] ');?> in your templates files or You can add [LRM_WP_MAILCHIMP] to post,pages.
sections.faq:

An answer to that question.
